org.jamwiki.db

Class WikiDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jamwiki.db.WikiDatabase

  • public class WikiDatabase
extends Object
    This class contains general database utility methods that are useful for a variety of JAMWiki database functions, including setup and upgrades.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String SPECIAL_PAGE_DIR
      Root directory within the WAR distribution that contains the default topic pages.

    • Method Summary

    • Field Detail

      • SPECIAL_PAGE_DIR

        public static final String SPECIAL_PAGE_DIR
        Root directory within the WAR distribution that contains the default topic pages.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • fixIncorrectTopicNamespaces

        public static int fixIncorrectTopicNamespaces()
                                       throws DataAccessException
        Utility method for validating that all topics are currently pointing to the correct namespace ID. This method is required for updating data when upgrading to JAMWiki 0.9.0, and is also available for use to resolve data issues after creating or updating namespace names.
        Throws:
        DataAccessException

      • migrateDatabase

        public static void migrateDatabase(Properties props,
                                   List<WikiMessage> errors)
                            throws DataAccessException
        Migrate from the current database to a new database. Tables are created in the new database, and then the contents of the existing database are transferred across.
        Parameters:
        props - Properties object containing the new database properties
        errors - List to add error messages to
        Throws:
        DataAccessException

      • getConnectionValidationQuery

        protected static String getConnectionValidationQuery()

      • initialize

        public static void initialize()

      • shutdown

        public static void shutdown()

      • purgeData

        protected static void purgeData(Connection conn)
                         throws DataAccessException
        This method causes all existing data to be deleted from the Wiki. Use only when totally re-initializing a system. To reiterate: CALLING THIS METHOD WILL DELETE ALL WIKI DATA!
        Throws:
        DataAccessException

      • readSpecialPage

        protected static String readSpecialPage(Locale locale,
                                        String pageName)
                                 throws IOException
        Utility method for reading special topic values from files and returning the file contents.
        Parameters:
        locale - The locale for the user viewing the special page.
        pageName - The name of the special page being retrieved.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • rebuildTopicMetadata

        public static int[] rebuildTopicMetadata()
                                  throws DataAccessException
        Utility method for regenerating categories, "link to" records and other metadata for all wiki topics.
        Returns:
        An array of two numerical values, the first one is the number of records updated successfully, the second is the number of records that failed.
        Throws:
        DataAccessException

      • releaseConnection

        protected static void releaseConnection(Connection conn,
                                        Object transactionObject)
                                 throws SQLException
        Throws:
        SQLException

                     throws DataAccessException,

        Throws:
